input_text:
Job Title: Blockchain Developer (Rust)

Location: California, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
About UsWe believe in busting boundaries and empowering innovators to think differently.
We work with clients to implement technology that transfers information on a scale and at a level of convenience that can’t be replicated elsewhere – and plan with them to translate those advantages into economic value.
We are a bespoke technology solutions firm dedicated to helping organisations embrace technology as a transformational force, not just for solving incremental problems. We provide deep operational support - from inception through all phases of growth - to rapidly launch products and services, create new business models, and prepare leadership and culture for the future.
What You Will Be DoingYou will be a member of our dynamic project teams that play a pivotal part in engineering dreams to become accessible and easy-to-use realities. You will write beautiful, scalable code, automate access to products and services, and ultimately help our customers successfully pursue their digital transformation journeys.
This is an excellent opportunity for a curious, eager engineer who is looking to join a dynamic, driven team on the journey to build products on the cutting-edge of blockchain and fintech innovation.
Collaborate on a daily basis with a small, nimble team of project managers and technical engineers to understand business requirements and user experience goals and pain points, and to translate those into scalable solutionsWrite and review testable, scalable code that supports and enhances the user experienceBuild modular, reusable components and featuresSupport and nurture real-time feeds and APIs to ensure that data renders with little delayIntegrate third-party systems via APIsOptimize the back-end database and front-end rendering performance in order to ensure a superior experienceContinuously work to bolster application design and implementation processes in order to improve quality and efficiencyActively participate in regular code reviews
We Would Love To Hear From You If You Have:History of developing Dapps in Rust that have deployed to mainnet and have passed security auditsMinimum 3 years of smart contract development experience in Rust, Solidity and/or MoveStrong working experience with GoLang, Javascript, Next.js, React, HTML and/or CSSStrong communication skills in EnglishFamiliar and has worked with version control (GitHub, GitLab) and Kanban style project management toolsA Diploma or higher in a relevant field
If you would love to experience working in a start-up environment growing at an accelerated speed, and you think you tick most of the requirements, come join us!
What You Will GetTraining and DevelopmentDiscretionary Yearly Bonus & Salary ReviewFlexible working arrangementsHealthcare Coverage based on location14 days Paid Annual Leave (excluding public holidays)

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Blockchain Developer (Rust)
output_json.summary: A Blockchain Developer position in California, USA, focusing on engineering and scaling solutions for digital transformation.
preferred_degrees: Diploma or higher in a relevant field
optional_skills: History of developing Dapps in Rust that have deployed to mainnet and have passed security audits
Strong working experience with GoLang, Javascript, Next.js, React, HTML and/or CSS
Familiar and has worked with version control (GitHub, GitLab)
job_responsibilities: Collaborate with project managers and technical engineers to understand business requirements and user experience goals.
Write and review testable, scalable code supporting the user experience.
Build modular, reusable components and features.
Support and nurture real-time feeds and APIs to ensure minimal delay in data rendering.
Optimize back-end database and front-end rendering performance.
Work to improve application design and implementation processes.
benefits: 14 days Paid Annual Leave (excluding public holidays)
output_json.company_information: A bespoke technology solutions firm dedicated to helping organisations embrace technology as a transformative force.
